page.title: 19Looking to the Future
page.content:
Stanground and Farcet in 1985 are stable communities at present experiencing little change.There are only a few new houses being built,and there is no industial development.The expanding city of{Peterborough}has not brought obvious changes to this area,but has put much improved facilities and opportunies for employment within reach.It is difficult to forsee any real changes in the character and life-styles in the near future.
This work on Stanground and Farcet was done during the Summer Term 1985 by a class of seven,eight and nine year old children from Southfields Junior School,Stanground.Assistance was given by teachers, parents and other adults wuth knowledge of the area.
